# cameras

**Instance Property**

An array of all the immersive cameras contained in the venue descriptor.

## Declaration

```swift
final var cameras: [ImmersiveCamera] { get }
```

## Configuring cameras

- **addCamera(_:)**: Adds a new immersive camera definition to the venue descriptor.
- **removeCamera(id:)**: Removes an immersive camera definition from the venue descriptor.
- **cameraViewModel(for:)**: Returns the camera view model for the given immersive camera identifier.
